info.description: REST API for accessing and managing CRM data. Generate API keys from the Nex web UI and use them to authenticate requests.
info.title: Nex Developer API

put.description: Add record to a list or update its list-specific attributes if it already exists

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key
Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

post.description: Retrieves all records that belong to a specific list with pagination
post.summary: Get records from a specific list

requestBody.description: List records request with pagination options

200.description: List of records with pagination info

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

patch.description: Updates list-specific attributes for a record that belongs to a list
patch.summary: Update a record within a list

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

get.description: Retrieves all entity definitions (objects) available in the workspace
get.summary: List all objects in the workspace

parameters.description: Include attribute definitions for each object
parameters.name: include_attributes

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

put.description: Creates a new record or updates an existing one based on a matching attribute

requestBody.description: Upsert record request with matching attribute and data

200.description: Created or updated record with all attributes

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

post.description: Creates a new record for a specific object type with the provided attributes

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

get.description: Retrieves all lists associated with a specific object type
get.summary: List all lists for a specific object

parameters.description: Include attribute definitions for each list
parameters.name: include_attributes

200.description: List of lists for the object

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

post.description: Retrieves records (entities) for a specific object type with pagination and optional filtering
post.summary: List records for a specific object type

requestBody.description: List records request with pagination and filtering options

200.description: List of records with pagination info

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

get.description: Retrieves a single record with all its attributes
get.summary: Get a specific record by ID

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

patch.description: Updates specific attributes of an existing record

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

post.description: Add arbitrary context through unstructured text. This endpoint allows you to provide contextual information about (new or existing) people or companies. Returns an artifact_id that can be used to retrieve the processing results via GET /v1/context/artifacts/{artifact_id}.

200.description: Context processing initiated, returns artifact_id for retrieving results

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

post.description: Query information using natural language. This enhanced endpoint supports three types of queries: (1) questions about specific entities (people, companies), (2) questions about multiple entities at once, and (3) generic workspace-level questions that don't reference specific entities. The AI will analyze your workspace context to provide relevant answers.

requestBody.description: Natural language query - can be about specific entities, multiple entities, or general workspace questions

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

get.description: Retrieve the results of a previously submitted ProcessText request using the artifact ID returned from the POST /v1/context/text endpoint.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

post.description: Create an AI-powered list generation job. The AI will search your workspace and generate a list of records matching your natural language query. Use the returned job_id to poll for results.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

get.description: Get the status and results of an AI list generation job. Poll this endpoint until the job status is 'completed' or 'failed'.
get.summary: Get AI list job status and results

parameters.description: Job ID returned from create job endpoint
parameters.name: job_id

parameters.description: Include full attributes for each record in the results
parameters.name: include_attributes

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

oneOf.description: Simple string values for common attribute sets

mode.description: Must be 'custom' when using object format

slugs.description: Array of attribute slugs to include

oneOf.description: Object format for custom attribute selection

developer.AttributesParam.description: Attributes parameter supports both string values ('all', 'primary', 'none') and object format for custom selection

parent_id.description: ID of the existing record to add to the list

name.description: Can be a string (e.g., 'John Doe') or an object (e.g., {'first_name': 'John', 'last_name': 'Doe'} for Person objects).

attributes.notes: Had a great demo call, ready to move forward
Had a great demo call, ready to move forward

name.description: Required when creating a new record, but optional when updating an existing record that already has a name. Can be a string (e.g., 'John Doe') or an object (e.g., {'first_name': 'John', 'last_name': 'Doe'} for Person objects).

matching_attribute.description: ID or slug of the attribute to match on

content.description: The unstructured text containing context information about people, companies, or other entities

context.description: Optional additional context about the content (e.g., source, type of activity)

example.content: Marcus Rodriguez commented: "Would love to book a demo"

query.description: Natural language query - supports single entity questions (e.g., 'What's the status with techflow.io?'), multi-entity questions (e.g., 'Compare engagement levels of Acme Corp and TechFlow'), or general workspace questions (e.g., 'Which deals are most likely to close this quarter?')

answer.description: AI-generated response to the query based on available workspace context

example.answer: Based on the available context, techflow.io appears to be a technology company. Marcus Rodriguez from techflow.io expressed interest in booking a demo on LinkedIn.

artifact_id.description: Unique identifier for the processing artifact. Use this ID to retrieve results via GET /v1/context/artifacts/{artifact_id}

created_at.description: Timestamp when the artifact was created

results.description: Processing results including extracted entities and context

entities_created.description: New entities created from the context

query.description: Natural language description of the list you want to generate

object_type.description: The type of records to include in the list (e.g., 'person', 'company')

limit.description: Maximum number of records to include in the list

job_id.description: Unique identifier for the list generation job

created_at.description: Timestamp when the job was created

query.description: The original query used to generate the list

object_type.description: The type of records in the list

created_at.description: Timestamp when the job was created

completed_at.description: Timestamp when the job completed (if applicable)
